Ibrahim says that he is happy to have made that decision because, since he first joined in 2012, he has been able to consistently feed his family, which has improved his day-to-day life significantly. Ibrahim will use the profits from this season to buy a cow.

The group will use this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer to plant a total of 3.25 acres. Given that some members of the group will also be purchasing a solar light, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of seven solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize

loans.name: Marangatu Rape Group

texts.es:
El grupo Marangatu Rape está en su ciclo número 7 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan para salir adelante, todas están poniendo su mayor esfuerzo para poder ir creciendo poco a poco y por medio del trabajo de cada una.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Lidia, quien tiene una despensa, que formo con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio, y que poco a poco ha ido mejorando por medio de su lucha diaria. Ella sueña con ir mejorando poco a poco y que algún día tenga una despensa bien grande y con mucha variedad de productos.
La Sra. Lidia solicita de este préstamo para la compra de bebidas como gaseosas, cervezas, caña, etc., lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchando por crecer. Agradecen por esta oportunidad que reciben de poder seguir creciendo y luchando cada día.
texts.en:
The group "Marangatu Rape" is in cycle number 7 of the Women's Committee Program, where all work and help each other to succeed. All are giving their best effort to to grow slowly through the work of each. 

One of the members is Sra. Lidia, who has a general store, that was started with great effort and sacrifice. Little by little, she has slowly been improving it through her daily struggle.

She dreams of gradually improving, and that someday she will have a very big general store, with a large variety of products.

Sra. Lidia requests this loan to buy drinks such as sodas, beer, alcohol, etc. which will help her to realize her business plan. This will help her to improve her income, and keep fighting to grow.  She appreciates this opportunity, that she has received, to continue to keep growing, and struggling every day.

loans.use: to buy drinks such as sodas, beer, alcohol, etc.

loans.name: Elmurod

texts.ru:
Элмурод жизнерадостный мужчина в возрасте 25 лет. Он еще не женат.Он живет вместе с родителями. У него очень дружная семья. Живут они в сельской местности. Чтобы иметь доход в семье, все члены семьи пытаются как-то зарабатывать деньги. Каждый трудится как может. Основным и стабильным бизнесом Элмурода является животноводство. Он разводит и продаёт скот. В этом деле ему помогает брат. 
Бизнес животноводства приносит ему хороший и стабильный доход. Поэтому он желает расширить этот бизнес. Ему необходимо купить ещё несколько голов скота для выращивания и дальнейшей продажи. Для этого Элмурод обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Он надеется, что этот бизнес будет успешно расширяться и приносить больше прибыли, чтобы качественно удовлетворять нужды семьи. Элмурод заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Elmurod, age 25, is a man with a positive attitude in life.  He is not married yet and lives with his parents.  He has a very friendly family and they all live in a rural area.  In order to bring an income home for the family, all family members try to somehow earn money.  Everyone works as he/she can.  Elmurod's is involved in animal husbandry, which is his main activity and a stable business.  He raises and sells cattle.  His brother helps him with the business.  Animal husbandry brings him a stable and decent income.  For this reason, he would like to expand his activity.  He needs to buy a few more head of cattle to raise and resell.  Elmurod has therefore turned to Arvand to receive a loan to buy cattle.  He is hoping to successfully expand his business and to make more profits, so that he will be able to properly meet the needs of the family.  He thanks Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: to buy some cattle.

loans.name: Jesus Is Our Saviour Group

texts.en:
Agnes is 46 years old and comes from Assin Fosu in Assin North District, the central region of Ghana. She had an elementary education, and is now the group leader of the Jesus Is Our Saviour group. Agnes is a married woman with seven children. The age of her first child is 25 years, and the youngest child is seven years. All seven children are in school. 

Agnes deals in cosmetics and has 13 years of trading experience. She has been able to employ three people to strengthen her sales force. Her main aim is to have one of the best retailing shops in her community in the years ahead. Aside from her cosmetics business, she also owns a disposable products store which provides her with some financial assistance. She is aiming to develop into wholesale cosmetics in the five years ahead. 

Agnes has been a very good client of the field partner since 2008, and to date has a good credit history. She needs micro loan support as additional working capital to buy at a wholesale price and meet her customers' demands. Agnes thanks all her micro lenders for their kind support.

loans.use: to buy more cosmetics for resale.

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El Comité  La Esperanza esta en el ciclo 3, están iniciando con muchas expectativas que quieren invertir para poder tener más ingresos en la casa y así  poder salir de la pobreza, todas ellas son mujeres muy trabajadoras y luchadoras.
Nancy, una de las integrantes de este grupo, se destaca por ser una persona muy activa que lucha para poder salir adelante y poder dar a sus seres queridos todo lo que ella no pudo tener. Ella comenta que todos los días empieza a trabajar desde muy temprano cuando prepara sus comidas, y luego las vende de manera ambulante.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar verduras, carne, hortalizas, pollo, jamón y otros, y con ello poder seguir con la elaboración de sus comidas, luchando cada día por mejorar.
texts.en: The Hope Committee is in its third loan cycle.  They are beginning with many expectations and they want to invest to be able to have more income at home and thus, get out of poverty.   All of them are very hard-working and strong women.  Nancy, one of the group members, stands out for being a very active person who strives to be successful and be able to give her loved ones everything that she couldn't have.  She says that she starts working very early each day preparing meals, and then she sells them on foot.  She is requesting this loan to be able to purchase vegetables, meat, chicken, ham, and other products, and with them she will be able to continue preparing meals, striving each day to improve.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, meat, chicken, ham, and other products.

loans.name: Madre Nazarello Group

texts.es:
“Madre Mazarello” está en su Primer ciclo, es un grupo nuevo, que tiene la mayor predisposición de poder crecer y salir adelante. Ellas están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza que les permitirá mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Juana,  quien en su  encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, es decir en una situación de pobreza extrema. Entre el trabajo que ella hace cuenta que se dedica en la venta de cosméticos, y con ello tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de cosméticos, y con ello poder seguir  con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder crecer y mejorar.
texts.en:
“Madre Mazarello” is in its first cycle.  It is a new group that has the greatest predisposition towards being able to grow and move forward.  They are in the “Poverty Elimination Program”  which will permit them to improve their living conditions.

One of the members is Juana, who in the survey showed a number one level of poverty, which is to say she is in a situation of extreme poverty. Among the work that she does is selling cosmetics and with that she has the means to be able to help her family.

She is asking for this loan to be able to invest in the purchase of cosmetics and with that to be able to continue with her sales as she has been doing.  She is grateful for the opportunity that she is receiving to be able to grow and improve.

loans.use: to buy various cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Gozibek

texts.ru:
Гозибек добродушный и трудолюбивый мужчина в возрасте 28 лет. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. Со своей семьёй Гозибек живут в сельском посёлке. Для того, чтобы иметь доход на проживание Гозибек занимается своим бизнесом. Вот уже на протяжении 10 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур, а также выращивает картошку. Затем, когда собирает урожай, вывозит на большой базар и там продаёт свой урожай. Раньше он занимался деканством и потом решил реализовывать свой урожай. 
Гозибек  хочет расширить бизнес, именно по выращиванию сельхозкультуры. Но сейчас у него недостаточно собственных денежных средств, чтобы закупить семена для посева урожая. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет взять кредит для закупа семян для посева. Гозибек очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Gozibek, age 28, is a good-natured and hardworking man.  He is married and he has two children.  He lives in a rural community with his family.  He makes a living running his own business. For the past 10 years already, he has been involved in crop farming including potato cultivation.  After the harvest, he goes to the main market to sell his crops.  He used to be involved in collective farming but later decided to sell his own harvest.

Gozibek wants to expand his crop-farming business.  However, he doesn't have enough personal funds at the moment to buy seeds for planting toward the next harvest.  For this reason, he has turned to Arvand to request a loan to buy seeds.  Gozibek is looking forward to a positive outcome and thanks Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Luchando Por Un Sueño Group

texts.es:
desde hace 14 años LOLA se dedica a la confeccion de ropa para niños y adultos, tiene su pequeño taller en su casa.
LOLA vive en una comunidad alejada con su esposo y sus 5 hijos.
desa poder tener su taller un poco mas grande y poder trabajar con mujeres que conocen de costura y no tienen trabajo. desea con este, su primer credito,Compra de una màquina de coser electrica, ya que la que tiene es a pedal y esta muy viejita; compra de telas , hilos, cierres,elasticos. 
sus hijos van a la escuela y se sienten orgullosos de tener una madre muy trabajadora.
LOLA forma parte de este grupo y recibirà 500 dolares para fortalecer su trabajo y negocio.
Ella espera en unos 3 años lograr su sueño de tener un taller con unas 3 o 4 madres de familia trabajando por su comunidad.
texts.en:
Since the age of 14, Lola has been producing clothes for children and adults. She has a small workshop in her house. Lola lives in a remote community with her husband and their five children. She wants to have a larger workshop so that she can hire unemployed women who know how to sew. For this reason, Lola is requesting her first loan. She will buy an electric sewing machine since the one she has is pedal-operated and very old. Lola will also buy fabrics, thread, zippers, and elastic. Her children attend school and are proud to have an extremely hardworking mother.

Lola is a member of this group and will receive her portion of $500 so that she can strengthen her business and improve her work. In about three years, she hopes to achieve her dream of having a workshop where she has hired three or four working mothers in her community.

loans.use: to buy an electric sewing machine, fabrics, thread, zippers, and elastic.

loans.name: Husein

texts.ru:
Хусейн родился  в 1983   году  в семье  дехканина. Он женат и  имеет троих детей.  Он занимается дехканством и земледелием.  Также в свободное время он работает мастером по ремонту домов. 
  Хусейн  хочет расширить свою деятельность по земледелию.  Он хочет купить минеральные удобрения. Но для этого не хватает его собственных средств.  Он обратился в Арванд за кредитом. Он заранее благодарит Аранд за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en: Husein was born in 1983 in a farmer's family.  He is married and he has three children.  He works on a midsize peasant farm and also grows his own crops.  In his spare time, he also works as a handyman and fixes houses.  Husein wants to expand his crop-farming activity and buy mineral fertilizers.  However, he doesn't have the personal funds necessary for this purchase.  He has turned to MDO Arvand for a loan.  He thanks them in advance for their support and their trust.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en:
Martha is living with her parents and she makes money by selling clothes. She used to be an itinerant saleswoman. After a lot of work she opened her own store. 

Martha needs a loan to buy more clothes for her business. She plans to sell women's coats. Martha attends the store alone. 

She is a single mother of one child but she works a lot and she hopes you can help her to improve her life quality.  Martha also is the only person at her house that supports the entire family.

loans.use: to buy women's coats to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase mineral water, soda, and eggs

loans.name: Niño Salvador Group

texts.es:
El grupo Niño Salvador está en su ciclo número 4 del programa de comité, a su vez están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde una de las integrantes es la Sra. Laura, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, lo que quiere decir que está en un nivel de pobreza extremo.
Laura se dedica a la venta de ropas, y quiere poder seguir creciendo para poder generar un mejor ingreso para su familia. Es una mujer muy trabajadora y por sobre todo luchadora.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar jeans, remeras, camisas, pantalones y otros, y con ello poder seguir con sus ventas. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo y luchando.
texts.en:
The group Niño Salvador, is in cycle number 4 of the Committee Program, and at the same time, are within the Elimination of Poverty Program. One of the members is Sra. Laura, who in her latest survey, showed a poverty level of one. Which means she is at a level of extreme poverty.

Laura makes a living selling clothes, and she wants to continue to grow to generate better income for her family. She is a very hardworking, and above all, strong woman. 

She requests this loan to be able to buy jeans, T-shirts, shirts, pants, and others, and thus be able to continue with her sales. She is grateful for this opportunity that she has received, to be able to keep growing and fighting.

loans.use: to buy jeans, T-shirts, shirts, pants, and others.

loans.name: Domiciano

texts.es:
El Sr. Domiciano, es de la Ciudad de Santaní, está casado, es docente catedrático, también tiene una despensa que es atendida por su señora, ambos generan ingresos para poder ayudar a su familia.
El es una persona que quiere salir adelante e ir creciendo, poco a poco lo va logrando, es por ello que pide este préstamo para poder comprar productos varios para poder venderlos, como ser verduras, carne, bebidas, lácteos, y otros. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir mejorando.
texts.en:
Domiciano is from the city of Santaní. He is married and is a teaching professor. Additionally, he has a supplies store that is run by his wife. Both generate income to help his family.

He is a person who wants to succeed and grow, and little by little he is managing to do so. Therefore, he is asking for this loan to buy various products to sell such as vegetables, meat, beverages, dairy, and others. He is grateful for this opportunity so that he can continue to improve.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat, beverages, dairy, and other items to fill his supplies store.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to make a large amount of tea, milk,and beignets to sell, so as to earn more

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
El señor Pedro tiene 65 años, está casado y tiene un hijo, el  señor se dedicaba a la docencia y tras jubilarse decidió montar una despensa en su casa, tiene gran cantidad de clientes y gran demanda de los productos que vende por lo cual necesita surtirse en mayor cantidad.
Es una persona muy trabajadora que lucha para poder crecer y tener con ello una vejez digna y sin privaciones, pide este préstamo para poder surtir su despensa con bebidas, lácteos, verduras, frutas y otros. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Señor Pedro, 65, is married and has a child. He made a living teaching and after retirement, decided to open a general store in his house. He has plenty of customers, and high demand for the products sold, which need to be filled in greater quantity. 

He is a very hardworking person, struggling to grow, and thus have a dignified old age without deprivation.

He asks for this loan to be able to stock his general store with drinks, dairy, vegetables, fruit, and others. He is grateful for the opportunity, that he has received, to be able to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy beverages, dairy, vegetables, fruits and others.

loans.name: Rusmenda

texts.en:
Rusmenda engages in basket weaving. She makes and sells native baskets made of palms and sells them to her respective clients. She is a 51-year-old married woman with three children, ages 20,15 and 11 years old. Her husband earns a living by being a laborer. 

Rusmenda is in need of capital to sustain her current sources of income. She is asking for a loan to buy materials like nito (palm), uway (a twisted rope) and wicker (pliable twigs). These materials will surely enhance the output of Rusmenda in producing more baskets to sell. Thus, she could be able to provide her children with nutritious meals and better shelter in which to live.

She is hoping that she can be successful in handling her business for sustainable living.

loans.use: to buy materials like nito (palm), uway (a twisted rope) and wicker (pliable twigs).

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
La Sra. Rosa se dedica a la venta de alimentos balanceados para aves, cerdos y vacunos. También cría y vende pollos y cerdos, se dedica a este trabajo desde el año 2012.
Es una persona muy sacrificada que pone todo de si para poder seguir creciendo y luchando, su pareja también la ayuda a poder mejorar cada día.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar balanceados para la venta, y con ello poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Sra. Rosa makes a living selling balanced feed for poultry, pigs, and cattle. She also raises, and sells, chickens and pigs. She has made a living in this work since the year 2012. 

She is a very self-sacrificing person, who puts it all out there, in order to continue growing and struggling. Her partner also helps her to improve every day.

She requests this loan to be able to buy balanced feed for sale, and thus to be able to continue with her sales, as they come.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for sale.

loans.name: Marietta

texts.en:
Marietta runs a sari-sari (general) store, selling various items ranging from noodles and canned goods to cooking oil, powdered milk and toiletries. She is a 50-year-old married woman form Maribojoc, Bohol. Two of her children are still attending school. In addition to her general store, she also has a food vending business. She sells cassava cakes to the locals in her community. 

She is asking for a loan to buy ingredients like flour, sugar and more supply of cassava. These ingredients will be used in producing  cassava cakes, which will be delivered to her customers. Thus, it will increase her daily income and her improve her ability to support the needs of her growing children .

Marietta hopes to be successful in the years to come as she properly manages her existing businesses.

loans.use: to buy ingredients, such as flour, sugar and more supply of cassava.

loans.name: Neciforo

texts.en:
Neciforo is 60 years old and lives in Butuay, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. He is widowed, with one child, now an adult. 

Neciforo operates his own motorcycle transport for hire and he earns approximately PHP 15,000 each month. He also receives a monthly pension as his wife's survivor. 

Neciforo has requested a loan to be used to purchase spare parts, steel plates, steel bars, and paint for his motorcab repairs. 

Neciforo has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) for four years. In the future, he hopes to acquire an additional tricycle for hire.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts, steel plates, steel bars, and paint.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
Yolanda has a banana farm in Tangub. This is her additional source of income for her family. 

Yolanda makes it a point to have good land preparation in order to have maximum yield and a good income. Recently, she requested a loan from Paglaum MPC to buy more banana seedlings of good variety, and to pay for clearing and preparing the soil for planting. 

Yolanda wishes to sustain her business and be able to supply bananas to the neighboring towns.

loans.use: to buy more banana seedlings of good variety, and to pay for clearing and preparing the soil for planting.

loans.name: Belarmino

texts.en:
Belarmino is 69 years old and lives in Butuay, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. He is married with five children who are now at their adult age.
 
Belarmino earns a living from a sari sari (general) store business that he has run for ten years. At present, he is enjoying a monthly pension of not less than 5,000 PHP, and said amount is so helpful to meet the family's needs.  

He has requested a loan to be used in purchasing construction materials for the finishing of their renovated house. 

Belarmino has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Belarmino hopes to expand his general store business.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Elvira Rose

texts.en:
Elvira Rose joined Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative in the year 2011, and she appreciates the programs, services and continuous education of the co-op. To earn a living, she has managed a small retailing business to sustain her family's needs. Elvira Rose is a member in good standing and very active in attending the various programs and services that the Cooperative offers. 

She has a small piece of farmland near her home. She is preparing for the future, especially for the education of her children. She is requesting a loan in the amount of 50,000 PHP. This loan is intended to buy farm supplies and finance her "falcatta" tree planting project. 

Elvira Rose dreams of nothing more than to have a happy and healthy life with her family.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies and finance her "falcatta" tree planting project.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria busies herself with selling assorted products. She is able to support her husband with providing for their daily needs and the education of their four children. 

Gloria has a shop that sells cosmetics, lingerie, clothing apparel and beauty and health products to the local community. She wants to expand her business to purchase more inventory to sell. She has reached out to Paglaum MPC for funding needs and applied for a loan of 50,000 PHP. 

She is happy to earn an income of 10,000 PHP per month. She hopes to open an outlet store in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more inventory to sell at her store.

loans.name: Reggie

texts.en:
Reggie is 23 years old and single. He wants to help his parents for a living and, for the education of his siblings, he engaged in a transport business as a source of income. 

Reggie decided to avail himself of a loan and become a member of Gata Daku Multi-Purpose Cooperative (GDMPC) to buy spare parts for motor maintenance, so that his motorcycle will be in a good condition and he can cater to more passengers and be able to generate more income.

In the future, Reggie wants to expand his business to sustain the education of his siblings.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for motor maintenance.

loans.name: Herminia

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Herminia works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell ginger business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from pig-fattening. Herminia is borrowing PHP 10,000 through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy additional sacks of ginger to sell through her buy-and-sell ginger business.

Herminia has been sustaining her business activities through her past seven loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of ginger to sell.

loans.name: Roselyn

texts.en:
Roselyn is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Roselyn is 48 years old and two of her children are still in school.

Roselyn has a business buying and selling recycled materials in the Philippines. She requested a 5,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase sacks of different kinds of recycled materials to sell.

Roselyn has been in this business for five years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of different kinds of recycled materials to sell.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is a hard-working, female entrepreneur with six children.

She earns a living by raising livestock in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 17,000 through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase additional livestock to raise. She supplements this income with earnings from her general store.

Marilyn dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock to raise.

loans.name: Nilma

texts.en:
Nilma is 38 years old and has one child. She is married and has one child who is still in school.

Nilma is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Nilma has been in this business for eight years now and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is 50 years old and married, with eight children.

She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Rebecca is borrowing PHP 30,000 through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase additional sacks of fertilizer.

Rebecca has been farming rice for 11 years and also earns additional income from buy-and-sell charcoal.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Scarleth Ivania

texts.es: SCARLETH IVANIA: Es una mujer luchadora de 32 años de edad, originaria de Puerto Cabezas. Madre soltera de 2 hijos: El mayor de 8 años estudia su tercer grado de primaria y un pequeño de 6 años. Actualmente habita en casa de sus padres, por lo que anteriormente había solicitado su primer financiamiento con Pana Pana y aprobado por KIVA, permitiéndole legalizar su terreno y comprar materiales para cercarlo. Está solicitando su segundo financiamiento para iniciar con gran esfuerzo poco a poco a construir su vivienda de minifalda (concreto y madera), con el préstamo desea comprar materiales de construcción: madera, clavos, zinc, bloques, cemento. Su sueño es terminar de construir su vivienda para brindarle a sus hijos un hogar seguro y digno.
texts.en:
SCARLETH IVANIA is a hard-working 32-year-old woman from Puerto Cabezas. She is a single mother of two children: the eldest is eight years old and is in third grade, and the youngest is six years old.

Currently, she is living with her parents. Her first loan—requested to Pana Pana and approved by Kiva—allowed her to authenticate the ownership of her plot of land and buy materials to fence the property.  

She is currently requesting a second loan to start building her house in the "mini-skirt" style (concrete foundation and wooden walls) little by little and through hard work. She plans to use the loan to buy building materials such as timber, nails, galvanized metal sheets, cinder blocks, and concrete. 

Her dream is to finish building her house to provide her children with a safe and decent home.

loans.use: to start building her "mini-skirt" house (concrete foundation and wooden walls).

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El grupo Mujeres Unidas está en su ciclo número 2 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas ponen su mayor esfuerzo para poder ir creciendo y mejorando cada día.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Berónica quien a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y las aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa, ella se encuentra mejorando su situación, ella vende comidas, que hace con sus propias manos, y que después sale a vender de manera ambulante. Es muy trabajadora y quiere poder mejorar cada día.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar productos para hacer sus comidas, como ser verduras, carne, pollo, hortalizas y demás, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder ser alguien en la vida.
texts.en:
The group “Mujeres Unidas” is in their second cycle of the program of the communal bank of women.  They are all putting in their greatest effort to be able continue growing and improving every day.

One of the members is Beronica who, through effort, continual work and the application of the dynamic behaviours of a successful woman, finds herself improving her situation.  She sells foods that she makes with her own hands and then sells as a street vendor.  She is very hard-working and wants to be able to improve every day.

She is asking for this loan to be able to buy products to make her meals such as vegetables, meat, chicken, greens and other items so that she can continue with the work as she has been doing.  She is grateful for the opportunity she is receiving to be able to be someone in life.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat, chicken, greens and other items to make meals

loans.name: Beatriz Virginia

texts.es: La Sra. Virginia es casada y vive en una casa humilde con sus dos hijos y su padre, que es un señor mayor de la tercera edad. Ella actualmente estudia y trabaja para solventar sus gastos, tanto como vendedora de automóviles de transporte masivo (minibuses) como de productos de belleza. En el primer caso, gana el sueldo mínimo nacional (el sueldo más bajo requerido legalmente en Bolivia). Adicionalmente, el esposo ha estado muy enfermo, por lo cual la Sra. Virginia  tuvo que cuidar de él durante mucho tiempo. Fortuitamente, su esposo ya está en proceso de recuperación y trabaja como albañil en construcciones de la cuidad de La Paz. El préstamo que solicita es para la compra  de mercadería para incrementar su nivel de ventas e ingresos y así poder encontrarse con mejores oportunidades. La Sra. Virginia se destaca en ventas y ha mostrado ganas de superarse; es digno de destacar su empeño y sacrificio en las actividades que realiza, caminando distancias largas y moviéndose de un lugar a otro sin importar la distancia.
texts.en: Virginia is married. She lives in a modest house with her two children and her father, who is an older man, a senior. Currently, she is studying and working in order to pay for her expenses. She works selling public transportation buses (minibuses) as well as selling beauty products. In the first case she earns the minimum national wage (the lowest minimum wage required in Bolivia). Also, her husband was very sick, so Virginia had to take care of him for a long time. Fortunately, her husband is already recuperating and is working as a worker in constructions around the city of La Paz. She is requesting the loan in order to buy merchandise to increase her level of sales and income, and in this way find herself with better opportunities. Virginia is good in selling and has shown desire to progress. It is important to highlight her hard work and sacrifice in the activities she does, walking long distances and moving from one place to the other without minding the distances.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to increase her level of sales and income, and in this way improve her life conditions.

loans.name: Adilaida

texts.en:
Adilaida is 43 years old and has seven children. She is married and three of her children are in school.

She is in the agricultural business of raising water buffalo in the Philippines. Adilaida requested a 19,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional water buffalo.

Adilaida has been raising water buffalo for six years now, and has borrowed loans 12 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional water buffalo.

loans.name: Emelyn

texts.en:
Emelyn is 38 years old and married with four children.

Emelyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a business buying and selling charcoal in the Philippines, and requested an 18,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy charcoal to sell at her business.

Emelyn has borrowed and paid back eight loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the charcoal sales business for three years and also earns an income from a food vending business.

She aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy charcoal to sell at her business.

loans.name: Julie

texts.en:
Julie is 32 years old, single, and helps her parents to earn an income.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and she has requested a PHP 11,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase more stocks to sell, like soap, spices, cooking oil, and canned goods.

Julie has borrowed and paid two loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns an income from farming vegetables.

Julie aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks to sell, like soap, spices, cooking oil, and canned goods.

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en:
A USD 1,500 loan is offered to Angelina to improve her business. She is married and she opened her food stall in 2009 with her own working capital. 

Angelina will use the loan to buy pork, buffalo meat, vegetables, and rice. She is generating a good income from selling.

She has been thinking of running a big business, after years of involving herself in doing business. She is living in a town with her family.

loans.use: to buy pork, buffalo meat, vegetables, and rice.

loans.name: Constantina

texts.en:
A 600 USD loan is offered to Constantina to improve her business. She is married and she has a second hand clothing shop, where many people come to buy every day. With the loan, she will buy shorts, pants, short sleeve shirts and long sleeve shirts for resale.

She has been involving herself in business activities since 2013. She feels so comfortable to run her business because she can earn money every day.

Running a business has made Constantina independent because she can be responsible for herself and also help her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future. Her husband is a driver.

loans.use: to buy shorts, pants, short sleeve shirts and long sleeve shirts for resale.

loans.name: Edinson

texts.es: Edinson es un joven de 23 años de edad, tiene nacionalidad colombiana, son 2 años que vive en Ecuador y comenta que este país es muy tranquilo, Edinson no puede  pronunciar claramente las palabras.  Edinson vive con una hermana su cuñado y una sobrina, Edinson se dedica a trabajar de mesero en un restaurante,  y también comercializa chanchos los días de feria de animales, Edinson necesita el dinero del crédito para invertir en la compra de chanchos que los adquiere en el mercado de animales y luego le vende a su cuñado que tiene una tercena, Edinson tiene la aspiración de seguir trabajando y dice que su problema en pronunciar las palabras  no le impide salir adelante.
texts.en:
Edinson,23, is a Colombian National.  He has lived in Ecuador for two years.  He says this country is very tranquil.  Edinson cannot clearly pronounce words.  Edinson lives with a sister, his brother-in-law, and a niece.  Edinson makes a living as a waiter in a restaurant and he also deals in pigs on the days of the animal markets.  
Edinson needs the loan money in order to invest in the purchase of pigs which he will acquire in the animal market and then sell to his brother-in-law who has a butcher shop.  Edinson has the aspiration to continue working and he says that his problem with pronouncing words will not stop him from moving forward.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Sunshine

texts.en: Sunshine is a young businesswoman from Migpangi, Bonifacio, Philippines. She is married with two school-age children. She is a farmer who wants to start raising pigs. Sunshine has requested a loan to expand her piggery business. She wants to buy five piglets and feed, and to build a concrete pen to start her business. She has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, she wants to raise healthy pigs and hopes to open a meat shop to earn more money for her family.

loans.use: to buy five piglets and feed, and to build a concrete pen to start her business

loans.name: Rodrigo

texts.es:
El señor Rodrigo vive en la cuidad de Carapeguá, es separado, vive con su madre que es costurera quien tiene taller al lado de su negocio.
El señor es muy responsable y honesto siempre tuvo la idea de crecer en las ventas se lo conoce en la zona por eso, tiene clientela formada en la zona ya que empezó con su negocio de Carnicería hace varios años y va creciendo, ya que constantemente invierte por la competencia.
El pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de carne en cantidad, de manera a poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Rodrigo lives in the city of Carapeguá and is separated. He lives with his mother, a seamstress, who has a sewing workshop beside his business.
Rodrigo is very responsible and honest. He always had the idea to grow in sales; he is known in the area for that. He has steady customers in the area as he started with his butcher shop business several years ago, and keeps growing since he constantly invests due to competition.
He is requesting this loan to be able to invest it in the purchase of meat in quantity so that he can continue with his sales as he has been doing.

loans.use: to buy meat for sale.

loans.name: Surayo

texts.ru: Сурайё 35 лет. Она замужем и мать четверых детей. Сурайё из района Шахритус. Она в районе живет вместе свекровью и детьми. Ее муж находится на заработках в Российской Федерации, чтобы заработать и обеспечить семью. Сурайё каждый месяц ждет, когда муж отправляет им деньги на продукты и на расходы детей. Она хочет зарабатывать сама и помочь мужу обеспечить семью. Сурайё решила купить несколько скота и заниматься скотоводством. Но для приобретения скота у нее нет денежных средств, по этой причине она обратилась за кредитом. Поддержите Сурайё достичь своих целей.
texts.en: Surayo is 35 years old, married, and the mother of four children.  She comes from the Shahrituz district of Tajikistan and she lives there with her mother-in-law and her children.  Her husband is a migrant worker in the Russian Federation.  The money he earns there helps to support the family.  Every month, Surayo waits for the money that her husband sends them so that she can buy food and take care of the children-related expenses.  She wants to make her own money now, so that she can help her husband to support the family.  She has decided to buy a few head of livestock and to become involved in animal husbandry.  However, she doesn't have the financial means to make this purchase, which is the reason why she is taking a loan.  Please support Surayo so that she can reach her goals!

loans.use: to buy a few head of livestock and start a new business.

loans.name: Yudy Elizabeth

texts.es: Yudy esta en sus 29 años de edad, es una joven alegre y muy trabajadora, Yudy vive con su hermano en un cuarto por el que pagan arriendo, Yudy es una joven colombiana y comenta que vive 3 años en Ecuador, Yudy se dedica a trabajar de empleada domestica ahi también tiene su negocio de crianza y comercialización de chanchos, Yudy va a invertir el dinero del crédito en la compra de chanchos y dice que este negocio le permite aumentar sus ingresos para cada dia intentar vivir de una mejor manera.
texts.en: Yudy is 29 years old. She is a happy and very hardworking young woman. Yudi lives with her brother in a rented room. Yudi is a Colombian young woman, who says that she has lived 3 years in Ecuador, Yudy works as a domestic employee. There, she also has a business raising and selling pigs. Yudi will invest the loan to buy pigs, and she says that this business allows her to increase her income to try to live each day in a better way.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Gilda

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Gilda works hard to support her family.

She has a food-vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Gilda is borrowing 8,000 PHP through NWTF to buy ingredients, such as meat, fish, chicken, spices and other utensils for her food-production business.

Gilda has been sustaining her business activities through her past loan from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients, such as meat, fish, chicken, spices and other utensils, for her food-production business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy human drugs

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es:
La Sra. Virginia tiene 54 años, ella es madre soltera y tiene una hija, ella es comerciante, posee una despensa bien surtida hace varios años en su ciudad.
 Se inicio con un pequeño negocio de ventas de comestibles y verduras en general, ahora ya cuenta con productos en gran cantidad. La señora Virginia es una persona honesta, responsable y muy emprendedora.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de verduras, carne, frutas, bebidas, lácteos y otros, de manera a poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Señora Virginia is 54 years old. She is a single mother and has a daughter. She is a businesswoman. She has had a well stocked store in her city for a number of years.

She began with a little business of selling food products and vegetables in general. Now she already has products in great quantities. Señora Virginia is a person who is honest, responsible, and very entrepreneurial.

She is requesting this loan to purchase vegetables, meat, fruits, beverages, dairy products, and other products, so that in this way she can continue with her sales as she has been doing.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat, fruits, beverages, dairy products, and other products for her store.

loans.name: Taman Sari Group

texts.en:
After the six-month loan period, the Taman Sari Group runs the pig businesses well. The pigs grow healthy and fat. They give them nutritious feed and vitamins. The group also earned a high price when they sold the pigs together to the big buyer. Most of them were satisfied with the result. 

Gusti Ayu sold all of her pigs. Having support from her husband, she is determined to increase the business to support her family. Now Gusti Ayu can make her dream come true to renovate her kitchen. As one source of the family’s income, Gusti Ayu continues her loan to increase the pig business. Gusti Ayu used her loan to purchase feed and three local piglets to resell for pig barbecue. The local pigs will be sold every two months. The profit from this business will pay for school fees. She hopes her children can get a higher education for a better future. She hopes that all the plans run smoothly, and that she can earn more profit. 

Now with ten members, the group receives 20,000,000 IDR and Gusti Ayu receives 2,000,000 IDR. Two members can’t attend the meeting due to a religious ceremony at their temple.

loans.use: to purchase feed and three local piglets to resell for pig barbecue

loans.name: Alexandra Maribel

texts.es: A sus 23 años de  edad Alexandra es madre soltera, su hija tiene 5 años y asiste a la escuela, Alexandra vive en el campo y se dedica a trabajar al jornal de trabajos de agricultura, y adicionalmente  se dedica a la crianza de ganado, Alexandra necesita el dinero del credito para comprar una vaca ya que comenta que su rutina diaria es la de levantarse a las 5 de la mañana y se traslada a  ordeñar sus vacas luego entrega al lechero este producto y cada fin de semana cobra por los litros de leche que que haya entregado. Alexandra  todos los dias a las 8 de la mañana ya esta en su trabajo de jornalera, Alexandra tiene  dice que va a seguir trabajando duro para sacar adelnate a su hija.
texts.en:
At the age of 23, Alexandra is a single mother. Her daughter is 5 years old and attends school. Alexandra lives in the country, and she spends the work day doing agricultural work. In addition, she raises cattle. 

Alexandra needs the money from the loan to purchase a cow. She comments that her daily routine is to get up at 5 in the morning and go to milk her cows. Then she turns this product over to the milk dealer, and at the end of every week she collects for the liters of milk that she has turned over. Every day at 8 in the morning, Alexandra is already at her daily job.

Alexandra says that she is going to continue working hard in order to raise her daughter.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Nurali

texts.ru:
Нурали жизнерадостный мужчина в возрасте 43 лет. Он женат и имеет троих детей. У него очень дружная семья. Живут они в сельской местности. Чтобы иметь доход в семье, все члены семьи пытаются как-то зарабатывать деньги. Каждый трудится как может.  Основным и стабильным бизнесом Нурали является животноводство. Он разводит и продаёт скот. В этом деле ему помогает жена. Она ухаживает за скотом, а также продаёт полученное от скота молоко. Бизнес животноводства приносит Нурали хороший и стабильный доход. Поэтому он желает расширить этот бизнес.
 Ему необходимо купить ещё несколько голов скота для выращивания и дальнейшей продажи. Для этого Нурали обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Он надеется, что этот бизнес будет успешно расширяться и приносить больше прибыли, чтобы качественно удовлетворять нужды семьи. Нурали заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Nurali, age 43, is a man with a positive attitude in life and a very friendly family.  He is married, with three children. The family lives in a rural area.   In order to bring an income home, all family members try to somehow earn money. Everyone works as he/she can. Nurali is involved in animal husbandry, which is his main activity and a stable business. He raises and resells livestock.  His wife helps him to run the business.  Nurali and his wife look after their animals and sell the milk they get from them.  Thanks to this animal husbandry business, Nurali makes a decent and stable income.  For this reason, he now wants to expand his activity.  He needs to buy a few additional head of livestock to raise and resell.  With this goal in mind, Nurali has turned to MDO Arvand and requested a loan to buy livestock.  He hopes to be able to successfully expand his business and to make more profits in order to properly meet the needs of his family.  He thanks MDO Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: to buy a few head of livestock.

loans.name: Amalia

texts.en:
Amalia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish-selling business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to buy more boxes of fish to sell.

Amalia has been in this business for 11 years. Amalia earns more income from a general store. She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
La Señora Carmen tiene 51 años, vive en la ciudad de Itá con su hija y hermanos. La misma es confeccionista de ropas hace varios años, posee máquinas propias para realizar dichos trabajos. La Señora tiene siempre prendas a terminar en gran cantidad en forma semanal que sus clientes siempre le acercan.
El préstamo que solicita es para capital de trabajo es decir para la compra de telas en gran cantidad para poder seguir con sus confecciones.
texts.en:
Mrs. Carmen is 51 years old and lives in Itá with her daughter and brothers. She has been a clothing manufacturer for several years. She owns her own sewing machines to perform her work. She always has a lot of garments to finish on a weekly basis, for her clients are always requesting items.  

She asks for the loan to buy fabric in bulk to continue making her garments.

loans.use: to buy fabric in bulk

loans.name: Eva

texts.es:
La Sra. Eva es de familia muy humilde es artesana y junto con su marido se dedican a la venta ambulante, realizando viajes a varias zonas.
Empezó con la venta de artesanías y de a poco se hizo de capital para dedicarse a la venta ambulante, realiza viajes a otras zonas llevando varios tipos de productos para la venta.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de  sobrecamas, colchas, sabanas, juegos de toallas, etc., y con ello poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Señora Eva is from a very humble family. She is an artisan and along with her husband works as a street vendor, making trips to various zones.

She began with the sale of handicrafts, and gradually she got enough capital to work as a street vendor. She makes trips to other zones carrying various types of products to sell.

She is requesting this loan to be able to invest in the purchase of bedspreads, quilts, sheets, towel sets, etc., and with that be able to continue with her work as she has been doing.

loans.use: to buy bedspreads, quilts, sheets, towel sets, etc.

loans.name: Edith Marelny

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA CATALINA DE SILLACANCHA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Edith Marelny se sigue dedicando al negocio de crianza de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas, la socia los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias y mercados, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 4 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los animales. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cuyes y gallinas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Edith Marelny is a member of the Santa Catalina de Sillacancha community bank, which is located in the district of Calca, in the province of Calca and department of Cusco.

Edith Marelny continues raising small animals like guinea pigs and chickens.  She fattens them, raises them, and later sells them at different markets.  She works from 8:00am until 6:00pm.  She has done this work for four years and it is going very well.  Her dream is to have a store where she can sell the animals.  She is requesting this loan to purchase guinea pigs and chickens.

She is happy with this loan and promises to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to purchase guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Warmicuna Llanqanchis Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “WARMICUNA LLANQANCHIS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Enriqueta ella es soltera y tiene 49 años y tiene 1 hijo; La socia trabaja en su negocio de artesania, la socia vende  tejidos, chompas, mantas y telares, la socia vende diferentes tejidos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de tejidos y telares. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar tejidos, chompas y telares.
 
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de venta de chicha, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de animales.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank “Warmicuna Llanqanchis.” The bank is located in Cusco, Anta district, Anta province.  

Enriqueta is 49 years old, single and has one son. She works at her handicrafts business where she sells fabric, sweaters, blankets and looms. She sells a variety of fabrics and works from 8:00 am until 7:00 pm. 

She has had this business for over 8 years and has done well. Her dream is to increase her sale of fabrics and looms. She asks for the loan to buy fabric, sweaters and looms. 

The other members make a living selling clothing, selling chicha, running a grocery store, and selling animals.  

Enriqueta thanks those who contribute to her dream through this loan and she promises to make the payments on time.

loans.use: to buy fabric, sweaters and looms

loans.name: Renee

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA CATALINA DE SILLACANCHA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Renee se dedica al negocio de agricultura, ella tiene un terreno donde cultiva maiz y papa, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su terreno de cultivo. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Renee is a member of the Santa Catalina de Sillacancha community bank, which is located in the Calca district, in the province of Calca and department of Cusco.

Renee works as a farmer.  She has land where she plants corn and potatoes.  She works from 6:00am until 5:00pm.  She has done this work for many years and it is going well.  Her dream is to expand her land.  

She is requesting this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizers.

She is happy with this loan and promises to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima is a mother of six children. She wants to give her family a good life and help her husband, that's why she engaged in a sari-sari store business. She earns income of PHP 3,000 each month, and that helps a lot with their family's needs. She decided to request another loan to buy additional goods to sell, to increase her inventory and have more sales to generate more income.

In the future, Fatima wants to save money from her business and use it to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy additional goods to sell.

loans.name: Ceferina

texts.en:
Ceferina, 53, is a resident from the town of Antequera, Bohol. She earns a living by engaging as a chainsaw operator. She imposes a certain fee to rent this equipment. She is a married woman with three grown children. Her husband has an income that helps Ceferina defray the family's daily expenses. 

She is asking to purchase fuel/gasoline, oil and pay for maintenance. These tools are very effective in the operation of this livelihood. Her earnings will improve and she will be able to pay her obligation. Thus, she will be able to set money aside and start to expand her existing business.

She is determined that she can improve the family's status of living in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase fuel/gasoline, oil and pay for maintenance

loans.name: Orville

texts.en: Orville is from Siquijor, in the Philippines. He is a very responsible father when it comes to the welfare of his family, since he has always been known to provide the best for them. He is earning a living in his retailing business. To generate more income, Orville decided to expand his resources after he learned that he can access financial assistance from PMPC. Consequently, he requested a loan to restock more inventory for his shop to increase sales. Orville smiles at the thought of having a comfortable life and providing his family with a better life.

loans.use: to restock more inventory for his shop to increase sales

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita sends you her thanks for your generosity because her previous loan has strengthened her business. She was able to grow her fund sused for her junk shop. The loan also helped her provide for her family's daily needs and pay their expenses.

She is very positive that she could improve her business more if you lend her an amount of 20,000 PHP. This new loan will go to more scrap and recyclable materials she needs to increase her profit from her business. An increase of profit will also result in her business becoming viable and sustainable. Simultaneously, she could sustain the needs of her family.

Aside from growing her business, Teresita aims to give her children the best education, which they don't currently have. She wants their lives to be improved and successful. She meets every week with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her work and also to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for recyclable materials needed in her business.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
La socia  pertenece al  banco comunal “Apu Asangani”.
La socia Antonia continua dedicándose a la agricultura ,la socia lleva años dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia continua cultivando , cebada, trigo, tubérculos, hortalizas entre otros, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas y abono.
La socia agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Antonia is a member of “Apu Asangani” community bank.
She has worked in agriculture for a long time, and she is very sucessful thanks to her hard work day in and day out. She farms barley, wheat, potatoes green vegetables and more. That's how she's been able to support her family.
She is asking for this loan to buy seeds and compost. She is very appreciative of this opportunity and she is committed to pay ever monthly installment on time.

loans.use: to buy seeds and compost

loans.name: Jovenes Del Barrio Florida Group

texts.es:
Este grupo es de la ciudad de Caaguazú, es un grupo de jóvenes que se unieron para poder ayudar a sus familias y serles útil. Uno de estos jóvenes es Hugo, quien es mecánico de motos, y también estudia en la facultad. El es un joven de muy buena familia, todos son muy trabajadores, y quiere poder seguir el ejemplo que sus papas le dieron, y de esa forma poder ayudarles y que se sientan orgullosos de él.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de repuestos para el taller de motos que tiene. En la foto hay mas personas, quienes son los padres de algunos de los jóvenes, quienes son a la vez codeudores y firman autorización.
texts.en:
This group is from the city of Caaguazú. It is a group of young people who united to be able to help their families and be useful to them. One of these youths is Hugo, who is a motorcycle mechanic, and he also goes to school. He is a young man from a very good family. All are very hard-working, and he wants to be able to continue the example that his parents gave him and in this way be able to help them and make them feel proud of him.

He is requesting this loan to be able to invest it in the purchase of spare parts for his motorcycle workshop. 

In the photo, there are extra people who are the parents of some of the young people and who are at the same time co-debtors and have signed their consent.

loans.use: to buy spare parts

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA CATALINA DE SILLACANCHA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Teodora  se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de  verduras, por medio de este negocio la socia quiere salir adelante, la socia es una mujer emprendedora, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de frutas y verduras. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar  cebollas, zapallos y zanahorias.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Teodora belongs to the communal bank “SANTA CATALINA DE SILLACANCHA”. The bank is located in the district of Calca, belonging to the province of Calca and the department of Cusco. Teodora still works selling vegetables. Through this job the member wants to move ahead. She is an enterprising woman. Her dream is to expand her business of sale of fruits and vegetables. Teodora is requesting the loan to buy onions, pumpkins and carrots. 
She is happy for the loan, and she promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy onions, pumpkins and carrots.

loans.name: Doris

texts.es:
La socia Doris se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de productos de belleza, la socia vende lápiz labiales, cremas y perfumes, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a su familia,el sueño de la socia es tener un bazar. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cremas,sombras, lápiz labiales y perfumes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Doris works selling cosmetics. She sells lip stick, lotions and perfumes. She supports her family with the business and her dream is to, one day, own a general store. She is asking for a loan to purchase lotions, eye shadow, lip stick and perfumes.
She is very happy about this loan and is committed to re-pay it on time.

loans.use: to buy lotions, lip stick and perfumes.

loans.name: Rosmery

texts.es:
La socia Rosmery  se sigue dedicando al negocio de fotocopiadora,la socia es una mujer trabajadora que por medio de este trbajo saca adelante a su familia.La socia solicita el credito para comprar papeles y tintas para la fotocopiadora.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Rosmery continues working at her photocopying business.  She is a hardworking woman who wants to move her family forward with her work.  She is requesting this loan to purchase papers and ink for the photocopier.

She is happy with this loan and promises to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to purchase paper and ink for the photocopier.

loans.name: Benedicta

texts.es:
La socia Benedicta pertenece al  banco comunal “Apu Asangani”.
La socia continua dedicándose a la agricultura ,la socia lleva años dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia continua cultivando , cebada, trigo, tubérculos, hortalizas entre otros, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas y abono.
La socia agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Benedicta belongs to the communal bank "Apu Asangani."  She continues working in agriculture. She has spent many years working in this business, which is going well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into it every day. She continues to raise barley, wheat, root vegetables, and green vegetables, among other crops, since this is how she is raising her family.

She is applying for the loan for the purchase of seeds and compost.

She is grateful for and values the loan, and she promises to make her monthly payments with great responsibility.

loans.use: to buy seeds and compost

loans.name: Magaly

texts.es:
La socia Magaly se sigue dedicando al negocio de botica,la socia vende medicamentos ,la socia es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que por medio de este trabajo quiere sacar adelante a su familia,el sueño de la socia es ampliar su botica.La socia solicita el credito para comprar medicamentos para la botica.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Magaly continues working at her pharmacy selling medicines.  She is an enterprising and hardworking woman who is helping her family succeed with her work.  Her dream is to expand her pharmacy.  She is requesting this loan to purchase medicines for the pharmacy.

She is happy with this loan and promises to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to purchase medicines for her pharmacy.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is 53 years old and married with two children. Grace works very hard to provide for them.

Grace runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell such as coffee, milk, sugar, canned goods, spices, noodles, bread, cooking oil and other personal care products.

Grace has been in this business for five years.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell such as coffee, milk, sugar, canned goods, spices, noodles, bread, cooking oil and other personal care products

loans.name: Beverlyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Beverlyn works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising livestock. Beverlyn is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell for her fish vending business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Beverlyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past seven loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Elsa Margoth

texts.es: Elsa tiene 35 años de edad,  esta divorciada del que fue su esposo, Elsa tiene 3 hijos de las edades de 6,8 y 13 años de edad, Elsa trabaja de educadaora de niños en una escuela muy alejada de la ciudad y tambien se dedica a la crianza de ganado, Elsa solicita el credito para invertirlo en la compra de terneros, ya que comenta que sus padres le enseñan a esta actividad, Elsa se dedica a su negocio y a su trabajo para darles dia a dia lo que sus hijos necesitan asobre todo para sus estudios.
texts.en: Elsa is 35 years old. She is divorced from her husband. She has 3 children of ages 6, 8, and 13. Elsa works as a children's educator at a school very far from the city and also breeds cattle. She is requesting the loan to invest it in the purchase of calves since she says that her parents teach her this occupation. Elsa devotes herself to her business and her work to give her children what they need day by day, especially for their studies.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Carlos Vinicio

texts.es: Vinicio es un señor divorciado que tiene 55 años de edad, Vinicio tiene una hija de 6 años y comenta que aunque no vive con ella se hace cargo de todos los gastos de educacion, alimentacion y demas necesidades de la niña, Vinicio se dedica a trabajar desde hace 5 años atrás  a la comencializacion de vacas y toda su vida se a dedica a la agricultura.  Vinicio necesita el dinero del credito para invertirlo el la compra de una vaca, Vinicio dice que esta contento con su negocio y que su meta en la vida es de que su hija sea una profesional para que tenga un buen futuro.
texts.en:
Vinicio is a divorced man of 55 years of age. He has a 6 year old daughter, and though she does not live with him, he takes care of the costs of her education, food and other needs. 

Vinicio began selling cows 5 years ago, and has dedicated his life to agriculture. He needs the loan to buy a cow.

He says he is happy with his business and that his goal in life is that his daughter becomes a professional so that she may have a good future.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Zonia

texts.es:
Zonia es una mujer de  tiene 36 años, casada, tiene 3 hijos de 18, 12 años y 1 año, y su negocio es el tejido de mantas de alpaca y vicuña.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, paciente, comprensiva, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la feria ‘16 de Julio’ un área caracterizada por el comercio informal, donde microempresarios de todos los rubros se reúnen 2 veces por semana para ofertar sus productos. De clima frio y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 0-142 grados centígrados.
Zonia es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro largo lo usa trenzado, baja estatura, complexión física robusta, su forma de vestir es tradicional (sombrero, manta y pollera) y su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. su vida la comparte con su esposo que se dedica a la panadería y con sus hijos; los mayores estudian en la escuela y el menor aún no se encuentra en edad escolar. Viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina y cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la confección de mantas de alpaca y vicuña. Las mantas son prendas de vestir femeninas, que se utilizan a manera de abrigo sobre la espalda y se aseguran al frente con un broche antiguamente elaborado de oro. Su uso es muy común en las mujeres de vestir tradicional, y según el material de los tejidos también logra ser una marca de estatus. Ella cuenta con un taller de confección propio, ubicado en un cuarto en su casa, cuenta con ayudantes de tejido que le ayudan a producir mayores cantidades. “inicié mi negocio tejiendo con mi hermana, luego ambas nos independizamos y abrimos nuestros talleres…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que trabaja en su casa y eso le facilita el cuidado de sus hijos y gastos de transportes, la desventaja son los cambios de temporada porque tambian cambia la moda. Su sueño es incrementar su producción para vender a más clientes, ella desea ampliar su negocio mediante la compra de una máquina tejedora para confeccionar y vender por mayor. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 2 años que se dedica a esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Zonia solicita un préstamo para la compra de una máquina tejedora para confeccionar y vender por mayor para cubrir los gastos de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Zonia  is 36 years old, married with three kids ages 18, 12 and 1. Her business is weaving blankets from alpaca and vicuña.

She is a good mom, hard working, patient, comprehensive and responsible. Her business is in the ’16 de Julio’ market, an area characterized by its informal commerce, where small business of all sizes get together twice a week to sell their products. The climate is dry and cold, with a temperature that varies during the day between 0 and 142 degrees centigrade. 


Zonia has a tan complexion, brown eyes, and long black hair that she wears in a braid. She is of short stature, physically robust and her manner of dress is traditional (hat, sweater and skirt). Her native language is Aymara, which she speaks with her family and uses Spanish with others. 

She shares her life with her husband, who makes a living at a bakery, and her sons. The older ones go to school and the youngest is still too young. They live in their own home made of brick and cement, with a corrugated iron roof, drinkable water, electricity and a sewage system.  

Her business is the manufacture of blankets made from alpaca and vicuña. The blankets are female garments that are worn like a coat over the shoulder and secured in front with a broach that traditionally was made of gold. Their use is common amongst women who dress traditionally. The fabric’s material can be a sign of status. 

She has her own manufacturing workshop in a room in her house. She also has assistants who help her produce greater quantities. “I began my business weaving with my sister. Later both of us became independent and opened our own workshops…” she says.  

The advantage of her business is that she works from home and this helps her be able to look after her kids without having transportation costs. The disadvantage is that fashion changes with the seasons. 

Her dream is to increase her production to sell to more clients. She hopes to expand her business by buying a weaving machine to manufacture and sell more. 

This is her second sequence of loans with the institution in 2 years that she will use for this activity.  

It is for these reasons that Zonia asks for this loan to buy a weaving machine to manufacture and sell more to cover the costs of her children.

loans.use: to buy a weaving machine to create and sell more to cover the costs of her children

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
El socio  pertenece al  banco comunal “Apu Asangani”.
El socio Santos tiene 30 años de edad es conviviente y tiene 01 hijo, él socio alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la agricultura y venta de cereales, el socio  lleva años dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, el socio es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio  solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas y abono.
El socio agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Santos is a member of “Apu Asangani” community bank.
Santos is 30 years old. He lives with his wife and child. He splits his work day between farming and selling cereal. He's been working for several years, and he is very successful thanks to his hard work. He is very responsible and diligent which has allowed him to support his family.
He is asking for this loan to buy seeds and compost.
He is very appreciative of this loan and he is committed to pay every installment on time.

loans.use: to buy seeds and compost.

loans.name: Los Kukichas Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LOS KUKICHAS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Quellouno, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convencion y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Alejandrina ella es soltera y tiene 60 años y tiene 4 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de cultivo de frutas, la socia tiene un terreno donde cultiva plátanos, café, mandarinas y naranjas, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su terreno de cultivo. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de golosinas, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the community bank “Los Kukichas”. The bank is in the district of Quellouno, in the province La Convencion, department of Cusco. Members have different types of businesses, such as selling sweets, selling clothes, a small grocery store and a restaurant.

One of the members is Mrs. Alejandrina, she is 60 years old, single and has 4 children. Her business is growing fruit. She has a plot of land where she grows bananas, coffee, tangerines and oranges. She works from 6:00 am to 5:00 pm and has been in this business for several years now and is doing very well. 
The dream of this member is to expand her cropland. Her loan request is for the purchase of seeds and fertilizers. 
She is grateful to those who form a part of realizing her dream through this medium and commits to fulfill the payment of her dues by the established deadline.

loans.use: purchase seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Javier

texts.es:
El socio Javier se sigue dedicando al negocio de transporte, el socio es una persona trabajadora que por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a su familia. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar llantas y repuestos para su carro.


El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Javier makes a living as a driver. he is a hard working man who through this loan hopes to help his family get ahead. 

The loan will be used to buy tires and spare parts for his car. He is happy for the loan and promises to make the payments.

loans.use: to buy tires and spare parts for his car

loans.name: Juliana

texts.es:
La socia Juliana se dedica al negocio de venta de queso, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a su familia, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender el queso. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar quesos.


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Juliana makes a living selling cheese. She works from 8:00 am until 6:00 pm. Through her business she wants to help her family get ahead. Her dream is to have a place where she can sell her cheese. 

She asks for this loan to buy cheese. She is happy for the loan and promises to complete the payments.

loans.use: to buy cheese

loans.name: Ccochayoc Bajo Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal CCOCHAYOC BAJO, él banco está ubicado en el distrito de Quellouno, provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Concepción tiene 48 años de edad tiene 02 hijos y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la agricultura y crianza de animales, la socia es una persona responsable, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia ,la socia dese poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando  a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas y abono.
Los socios se sienten agradecidos por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Concepción is a member of Ccochayoc Bajo community bank. The bank is located in the district of Quellouno, province of La Convención, and department of Cusco.
